From: "Thiemann, Rene" <Rene.Thiemann@uibk.ac.at>

https://www.isa-afp.org/entries/CryptHOL.shtml

Game-based cryptography in HOL by Andreas Lochbihler, S. Reza Sefidgar and Bhargav Bhatt

Many thanks to all the contributors,
